alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 27 at 12:36PM EST until November 28 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett County. In Virginia, Western Highland County. In West Virginia, Western Grant and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 4 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect cold wind chills between 5 to 15 degrees below zero.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
